newReleases.title: Dune
newReleases.description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about a noble family's son protecting the galaxy's most valuable asset.

newReleases.title: No Time to Die
newReleases.description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when an old friend asks for help.

newReleases.title: The Batman
newReleases.description: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves cryptic clues.

mostlyWatched.title: The Shawshank Redemption
mostlyWatched.description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption through acts of decency.

mostlyWatched.title: Inception
mostlyWatched.description: A thief steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology and must plant an idea into a CEO's mind.

mostlyWatched.title: The Dark Knight
mostlyWatched.description: Batman faces the Joker, a menace who tests his ability to fight injustice.

classics.title: Forrest Gump
classics.description: Historic events unfold through the perspective of a man with an IQ of 75.

classics.title: Interstellar
classics.description: Explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

classics.title: Parasite
classics.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten a symbiotic relationship between two families.

popularSeries.title: Stranger Things
popularSeries.description: Kids in 1980s Indiana confront supernatural forces and secret government experiments.

popularSeries.title: Breaking Bad
popularSeries.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer navigates dangers and moral challenges.

popularSeries.title: Game of Thrones
popularSeries.description: Noble families vie for the Iron Throne as ancient forces awaken across Westeros.

newSeries.title: The Witcher
newSeries.description: A mutated monster hunter struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

newSeries.title: Loki
newSeries.description: The mercurial God of Mischief confronts his past and future after stealing the Tesseract.

newSeries.title: Squid Game
newSeries.description: Hundreds of players risk their lives playing children's games for a tempting prize.
